summary: Add Some Armored and Enchanted Robes for your mage girls.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=yellow]Neo\'s Swordmage Robes 2(Armored Robes with CBBE)[/color][/b]

Author : Neovinci aka Meister

=================================

[youtube]AEY3mrCtAno[/youtube]
( Swordmage introducing Sexy Village/town series. Author : beatbox567 )

=================================

Add Some Armored and Enchanted Robes for your mage girls.

It is remake and fixed version of Neo\'s Swordmage Robes, I\'ve released before.

It has female items only, even though I play male chars. 

(was hard work without Blender script for Skyrim. XD)

-It has special recipe.

-The Essence bottles will respawn. 

-Lower leveled items have higher Armor rating.

-Higher leveled items have higher effects.

-It will helpful whatever your chars mage style.

-Levels for Create : Novice-1/ Apperentice-5/ Adept-12/ Expert-25/ Master-40
 (No Perk)
 



There is possibility contorted unnaturally with some active poses.

Use 7z tool, Unzip and Drag into DATA folder where your Skyrim is installed.

(..STEAM/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data)


May the Force be with You.

=================================

[b][color=yellow]Update - equip state fixed esp for v1.00[/color][/b]
Please download and overwright newly updated ESP file.

[b][color=yellow]Update - UNP vesion[/color][/b]
Standalone/fixed esp/optinal textures(Original textures are not included)

=================================

-Optional Textures : Extract the optional file and just overwight into your Data Folder. 

=================================

[b][color=yellow]Locaton :[/color][/b] In a pouch, near by hot deck, Riverwood.(as screenshot)

[b][color=yellow]Requirement :[/color][/b] Calientes Female Body for female Armours(for CBBE version - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666)
[b][color=yellow]Requirement :[/color][/b] DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99(for UNP version - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709)

[b][color=yellow]Recommend :[/color][/b] Calientes Female Body V3

=================================

[b][color=yellow]Credit[/color][/b]

thanks to

Betheada for this wonderful land.

Caliente for nice CBBE Female Body

dimon99 for DIMONIZED UNP female body

Blender developers

Members of \'NAVER ElderScrolls7\' cafe for useful tips and tutorials

Members of \'Naver Escroll\' cafe

TESNEXUS Staff membership and many Nexus friends 


=================================

[b]You can do whatever with it for personal usage. 
It\'s not free for other\'s Conversion, neither Upload on any other sites.
Do not upload anywhere include Steam workshop without my Permission.
If You want it, Send A PM or Mail to Me.[/b]
author: Neovinci aka Meister
